main event: A civilian observed a single unidentified object in the sky near Condon, Oregon on July 29, 1966 for 3 3/4 hours.
interesting points: The object appeared to be moving slowly to the west and changed color from silver/aluminum to red.
The object was described as looking like a spinning top.
An aircraft was also present in the same area during the sighting.
The observers used binoculars to view the object.
Detailed weather conditions were reported, including wind speeds, cloud cover, and temperature gradient.
sighted object: a single unidentified object, described as looking like a spinning top
witnesses: civilian observers, including Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED]
